title: (1 oz / 30 ml) GLYCOLIC Acid 50% Skin Chemical Peel - Unbuffered - Alpha Hydroxy (AHA) For Acne, Oily Skin, Wrinkles, Blackheads, Large Pores & More (from Skin Beauty Solutions)
description: Alpha-hydroxy acids are commonly found and isolated from fruits of all sorts. That is why they are referred to as fruit acids. For example, malic acid is found in apples, citric acid can be isolated from most citrus fruits and glycolic acid is commonly found in honey and sugar cane. Lactic acid is found in milk that has soured and Tartaric acid can be isolated from fermented grapes (wine).. Glycolic acid works as an exfoliating agent because of its high acidity but easy solubility. When placed on the skin as part of an exfoliating cream or gel, glycolic acid goes under the damaged upper layers of skin and destroys the 'glue', which holds dead skin to the surface. As this dead skin is chemically burned off, the other ingredients carry the individual flakes away and a water rinse neutralizes the remaining acid. The result is a much-smoother skin surface and a more youthful appearance. A secondary benefit is glycolic acid's ability to draw moisturizers into the newly exfoliated skin surface. One study showed that topical treatment twice a day for 3 months with 5% glycolic acid cream at pH 2.8 affected surface and epidermal changes, while the same treatment, but with a 12% cream reached deeper and influenced both the epidermis and the deeper dermis layer, and resulted in increased epidermal and dermal firmness and thickness. Both showed clinical improvement in skin smoothness and in the appearance of lines and wrinkles. Another study showed that AHAs might thin the outer stratum corneum, but actually end up increasing the overall thickness of the epidermis. This thickening is accompanied by increased synthesis of collagen. It is apparent that alpha-hydroxy acids may do more than just increase exfoliation and skin cell turnover

title: Skinceuticals Retinol 1 Maximum Strength Refining Night Cream, 1 Fluid Ounce
description: Perfect for problematic and photo-damaged skin, Retinol 1.0 contains 1% pure retinol, the highest concentration currently available, and should be used for advanced treatment of pre-conditioned skin. Designed for maximum efficacy and stability, SkinCeuticals Retinol is formulated with highest concentrations of pure retinol available and enhanced with the latest stabilization and delivery technologies. Our retinol products help stimulate cell regeneration and build collagen to diminish the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and age spots from both photo- and intrinsic- aging. Additionally, they help minimize the appearance of pore size, while correcting blemishes and blotchiness often associated with problematic skin.

title: Watts Beauty 2% Retinol - Vitamin A / Hyaluronic Acid Antioxidant Moisturizer Cream- Proudly Made in the USA - 97% Natural / 71% Organic - 2oz
description: A powerful cocktail of antioxidants combine with Vitamin A may help to diminish fine lines, wrinkles, and premature aging due to sun exposure. Vitamin A boasts a long list of clinically proven restorative, anti-aging properties. This result oriented formulation may help fight free radical damage as well as restore and renew firmness, elasticity, and thickness to the skin.

title: Watts Beauty 2% Retinol Serum 5 (Vitamin A) Hyaluronic Acid Gel Blend - 98% Natural / 72% Organic - 1oz
description: Vitamin A is proven to improve mottled pigmentation, fine lines, wrinkles, skin texture, skin tone, color, as well as your skins hydration levels.This suspension of Retinol (Vitamin A) contains a synergistic blend of active ingredients to help to soften and heal the skin with the most efficient and effective moisturizing system. Vitamin A has a molecular structure that's tiny enough to get into the lower layers of skin where it finds collagen and elastin.

title: Strongest OTC Retinol 2.0% Available Without A Prescription 2.5 oz. from NCN Skincare
description: NEW! Time Released, All-Trans Retinol in 1.0% and 2.0% formulas! The strongest OTC Retinol available. 2.5 oz. After years of research, testing, trial and error, I'm VERY excited to finally be bringing to you my new All-Trans Retinol in two strengths: 1.0% and a whopping 2.0%! All-trans mean that the stable Retinol, which is a derivative of Vitamin A, actually converts to retinoic acid on the skin. This stable retinol is encapsulated in liposomes which makes it time-released and also makes it non-irritating; even at 2.0%. Cucumber and Comfrey extract have been added to further enhance its non-irritating properties. Is paraben and chemical-free, safe & effective for ALL skin types and has the highest concentration of OTC Retinol at the lowest price.Our best-selling All-Trans Retinol 2.0% now has Trylagen PCB (paraben free) added to it.Retinol stimulates Collagen Type I. Now with the addition of Trylagen PCB, Collagen Types I, III & IV are restored! Collagen I & III are the main collagen types in connective tissue.At 4 years old, 90% of collagen in our body is Collagen Type III, but when we age to 50 years old, 90% of collagen in our body is Collagen Type I. Collagen Type III is the "Youth Collagen" produced by young skin and is the type of collagen our All-Trans Retinol 2.0% stimulates.

title: Clairol Nice 'N Easy Born Blonde Hair Color, Maxi 1 Kit
description: Nice 'n Easy Born Blonde delivers simply blonde bliss. Born Blonde Maxi is for use on dark blonde to black hair. Clairol offers a complete range of easy to use blonding hair color products that give you brilliant, natural-looking blonde results. Whether your starting color is light blonde to dark brown or even black, you can easily become completely, beautifully blonde with results that feel incredibly soft & silky.
